Headline: #79 79th Temporary Reroute at 79th/Racine
ShortDescription: 79 79th  buses are temporarily rerouted via 79th, Loomis, 76th, Halsted, 79th and over regular route: due to, street blockage near 79th/Racine.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How will this affect my trip?

 

#79 79th  buses are temporarily rerouted via 79th, Loomis, 76th, Halsted, 79th and over regular route: due to, street blockage near 79th/Racine.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #94 buses Temporary Northbound Reroute near California/Roosevelt
ShortDescription: Northbound 94 buses are temporarily rerouted via California, Ogden, Sacramento, Roosevelt, California due to street blockage near California/Roosevelt.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
